Oracle® Fusion Middleware Java API Reference for Oracle ADF Faces
12c (12.2.1.4.0)
E81453-01

Package oracle.adf.view.rich.component.rich.output

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PartialRichContextInfo
    The contextInfo control adds an area which can be clicked to show contextual information.
    PartialRichPanelCollection
    A panel component that aggregates collection components like table, treeTable and tree to display standard/application menus, toolbars and statusbar items.
    RichActiveImage
    The image component renders an image specified by the source property.
    RichActiveOutputText
    The activeOutputText component supports server side data change push for its "value" attribute.
    RichContextInfo  
    RichIcon
    The icon component renders a skin specific icon.
    RichImage
    The image component renders an image specified by the source property.
    RichInlineFrame
    The inlineFrame component creates an inline frame tag.
    RichMedia
    The media component displays media content, such as audio, video, or image in a player embedded in the user agent.
    RichMessage
    Component that displays a message on behalf of a component.
    RichMessages
    The messages component gives the user important messaging information that may or may not be directly related to specific components.
    RichOutputFormatted
    The outputFormatted bean accepts a string in its "value" attribute containing a very limited set of HTML markup and outputs formatted results.
    RichOutputLabel
    Component that displays a label for a form component, including a text label, and an optional icon indicating whether the component is required.
    RichOutputText
    The outputText component supports styled text.
    RichPanelCollection  
    RichProgressIndicator
    The progressIndicator component can be used to give users an indication that there is a back end task in progress.
    RichSanitized
    af:sanitized component works like f:verbatim except: It supports a valueExpression as well as inline content.
    RichSeparator
    The separator creates a horizontal separator.
    RichSpacer
    The spacer occupies a fixed amount of space in a layout, specified by its width and height attributes.
    RichStatusIndicator
    The statusIndicator displays various icons (animated and static) to indicate server activity.
